item.title: Add search to Hugo multilingual static site with Lunr
item.description: Initial I had the need to implement search functionality on my site. Content on is in different languages. The goal is to impelemnt search for all pages and separate search results for each and every language. How it works Hugo generates the search index. In this case it means that we get json file with every static page on the site. To make search works we need to create index. lunr.js takes care of it. Client send query -> our script “tries to find” in the index

item.title: Hugo resize a picture on click
item.description: Introduction Hugo by default uses parsing of markdown files. This means that we get the html code as it is written in markdown. In order to understand which images we can enhance, we add a separate tag/key/id to those images Tools To implement the functionality, we need to: Write/connect a script/handler that will perform the zoomin effect on the images we need Add the necessary metadata to the images, so the script can find them zoomin script To add the ability to zoom on click, we will use the medium-zoom package.
